short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep English helps you to study english words more conveniently.
short.zh_CN: Keep English 帮助你更方便的学习单词

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When learning English, we shouldn't just translate words into our native language and then memorize them. It's advised to use English-to-English dictionaries, understand the word's definition, read sentence examples, and employ English thinking to absorb English vocabulary。

学习英文，不应该将单词翻译成自己本国的语言，然后再去背诵，应该通过英英词典，结合单词的解释和例句，用英语思维来学习英语单词
